entry.title: Dowdy indicted for fatal crash with UCC softball bus
entry.summary: Johnathan Dowdy, 32, was arraigned on 25 charges in a crash that killed two UCC softball players and injured eight others. He remains in jail on $2 million bail. Prosecutors allege reckless driving with extreme indifference. His next court date is set for May 21.

entry.title: ROSEBURG WITH BELOW NORMAL RAIN FOR APRIL, ABOVE NORMAL FOR WATER YEAR
entry.summary: May 2, 2025 4:10 a.m. Roseburg saw below normal rainfall for the month of April but is still above the normal amount for the water year. entry.title: Boil Water Advisory Issued for Glendale Residents After Main Break
entry.summary: Glendale residents are under a boil water advisory after a main break on Azalea Glen Road. The issue was fixed Wednesday night, but water must be boiled until test results confirm it’s safe. Call 832-2106 for questions.

entry.title: Reedsport unites to hold Make-A-Wish festival for local teen
entry.summary: REEDSPORT — When Bubs Reynolds was born 7 weeks premature in 2011, medical professionals estimated he had a less than 1% chance of surviving birth.
